Gunthor the Brave is a barbarian who lives in Barbarian Village. He is located in the Long Hall in the northern part of the village. Gunthor is the highest level barbarian in Barbarian Village. He is stated to be a mighty warrior and a chieftain of the barbarians.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Barbarian Village291Maplink

Fighting strategy[edit | edit source]

Like all barbarians from Barbarian Village (except for Litara and Peksa), if a player talks to Gunthor, the player will be attacked. Players who attack him using Ranged or Magic can do so safely from behind the tables or stools. He is weak to Magic and Ranged.

Tips[edit | edit source]

  • Players can grab free cooked meat and beer from the tables.
  • Trout, pike, and salmon can be fished from the River Lum east of Barbarian Village. Players with high enough Fishing and Cooking levels can catch these fish and cook them on the nearby fire. Player lacking the required levels are often able to pick up fish dropped by other players instead of catching it themselves.
  • If players accidentally clicks the "Talk-to" option on him but does not want to fight him, they can click somewhere else on the map to avoid the battle. Gunthor will only engage when the player finishes the conversation.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Gunthor the brave kill is worth 108.65.
